heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly sunny, except clouds decreasing more slowly in central New Hampshire, and from the northern Champlain valley eastward. Highs from the upper 50s to mid 60s in the south, and mid 50s to around 60 north. Southwest winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Clouds variable early, then increasing. Chance of showers west of the Greens late, a rising chance along and east of the Greens. Lows from the mid 40s to around 50, with some lower 40s northeast and in the Adirondacks. South winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly cloudy, with rain likely early, mainly along and east of the Greens; otherwise scattered to numerous showers, tapering off far south in the afternoon; a rumble of thunder possible. Highs in the upper 50s to lower 60s south and in the broad northwestern valleys, mid to upper 50s elsewhere north. Southeast winds 5 to 10 mph, becoming south.
